messages.message: @margaret.tomaszczuk one search I wish we had was being able to ask when the next Instabreak or when the next country based holiday for me is. Under, Drives HRDrive is listed but I was not able to find the US (or any country holiday calendar). On a similar not, if search can enforce user permissions (searching for info) can it use other uder details (such as my office location) and provide the appropriate answer if I asked "When is the next company official Holiday for me?"
